actions.committee: Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to posthumously award a Congressional gold medal to Alice Paul in recognition of her role in the women's suffrage movement and in advancing equal rights for women.
short_title: Alice Paul Congressional Gold Medal Act
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Alice Paul Congressional Gold Medal Act - Provides for the posthumous presentation of a congressional gold medal to Alice Paul in recognition of her role in the women's suffrage movement and in advancing equal rights for women.

titles.title: Alice Paul Congressional Gold Medal Act
A bill to posthumously award a Congressional gold medal to Alice Paul in recognition of her role in the women's suffrage movement and in advancing equal rights for women.
